forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High near 20C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and clouds mixed. High 67F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of rain late. Low 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of rain late. Low 48F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 50F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 4C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 39F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High near 50F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 54F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 38F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 53F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 52F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low near 40F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
